official_title: Assistant Professor Faculty Fellow, NYU Shanghai
bio:
Christina is an Assistant Professor Faculty Fellow of Economics at NYU Shanghai. Prior to completing her PhD in Economics from University of Warwick she obtained a BSC. and an Msc in Economics from the London School of Economics and Political Science.

Christina ’s research interests are in Development Economics, InternationalTrade and Economic History. She is particularly interested in the role of relationships and social networks.

Research Interests

  • Development Economics
  • International Trade
  • Economic History

Education

  • Bsc, Economics, London School of Economics and Political Science, 2009
  • Msc, Economics, London School of Economics and Political Science, 2010
  • PhD, Economics, University of Warwick, 2017

Languages

  • German, English and French
